claim: This repository is a reference implementation and reproducible verification scaffold for Chronos/EntropyDepth URF binding; it introduces no new axioms or theorems beyond declared artifacts
constraints: no external network access during verification
non_claims: no claim of resolving P vs NP or any Clay problem
no claim of completeness of Chronos consequences
no guarantees beyond documented tests and checks
no claim that passing tests implies mathematical truth beyond stated invariants
